verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David יַֽעַנְךָ֣ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'an-Cha hear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom thee in the day צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rah; of trouble יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ <S%H7682><s%> ye-sag-gev-cha, defend שֵׁ֤ם׀ <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֱלֹהֵ֬י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

יִשְׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> yish-lach- Send עֶזְרְךָ֥ <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-re-Cha thee help מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> mik-Ko-desh; from the sanctuary וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> u-mitz-tzi-Yon, thee out of Zion יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5582><s%> yis-'a-De-ka. and strengthen

יִזְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> yiz-Kor Remember כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4503><s%> min-cho-Te-cha; all thy offerings וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ <S%H5930><s%> ve-'o-la-te-Cha thy burnt sacrifice יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה <S%H1878><s%> ye-dash-she-Neh and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

יִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> yit-ten- Grant לְךָ֥ le-Cha כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> chil-va-Ve-cha; thee according to thine own heart וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all עֲצָתְךָ֥ <S%H6098><s%> 'a-tza-te-Cha all thy counsel יְמַלֵּֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> ye-mal-Le. and fulfil

נְרַנְּנָ֤ה׀ <S%H7442><s%> ne-ran-ne-Nah We will rejoice בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H3444><s%> bi-Shu-'a-Te-cha, in thy salvation וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> u-ve-shem- and in the name אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God נִדְגֹּ֑ל <S%H1713><s%> nid-Gol; we will set up [our] banners יְמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> ye-mal-Le fulfil יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4862><s%> mish-'a-lo-Tei-cha. all thy petitions

עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, Now know כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ׀ <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-a' saveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I that the LORD מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ <S%H4899><s%> me-Shi-Cho his anointed יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ <S%H6030><s%> Ya-'a-ne-hu he will hear מִשְּׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> mish-she-Mei heaven קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho; him from his holy בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת <S%H1369><s%> big-vu-Rot, strength יֵ֣שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> Ye-sha' with the saving יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No. of his right hand

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh Some בָ֭רֶכֶב <S%H7393><s%> Va-re-chev Some [trust] in chariots וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and some בַסּוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> vas-su-Sim; and some in horses וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ׀ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> be-shem- the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God נַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> naz-Kir. but we will remember

הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah They כָּרְע֣וּ <S%H3766><s%> ka-re-'U They are brought down וְנָפָ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-Fa-lu; and fallen וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we קַּ֝֗מְנוּ <S%H6965><s%> Kam-nu, but we are risen וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ <S%H5749><s%> van-nit-'o-Dad. and stand upright

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah; Save הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, let the king יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Ne-nu hear בְיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> ve-yom- us when קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'E-nu. we call
